name: Looking Up to the Earth
description:
A short, bittersweet tale about two souls living on the moon, and how their own shyness kept them apart until the end

Story written by Kristopher Chuback

Art by Jon Fawkes

Edited by Michael Bateman

Made in a month along the same guidelines as NaNoRenO. We spent November making it because I was going to be extremely occupied in March, but I still wanted to try this. This was my first visual novel and I had a lot of fun and learned a lot.

Link on Lemma Soft forums: https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=11&t=57491
